name: Cesium sulfate

name: Copper(I) cyanide

name: Copper(II) sulfate

name: Hypochlorous acid
physical_form: green-yellow; stable only in aqueous solution

name: Iron(II) sulfide

name: Iron(II,III) oxide

name: Lead(II) sulfide

name: Lithium chloride

name: Phosphinic acid

name: Rubidium dichromate

name: Silicon
